an4.221:4.1: “Mendicants, there are these four kinds of bad conduct by way of speech.
an4.221:4.3: Speech that’s false, divisive, harsh, or nonsensical.
an4.221:4.4: These are the four kinds of bad conduct by way of speech.
an4.221:4.5: There are these four kinds of good conduct by way of speech.
an4.221:4.7: Speech that’s true, harmonious, gentle, and thoughtful.
an4.221:4.8: These are the four kinds of good conduct by way of speech.”
